text: Court don stop di plan by Nigeria main opposition Peoples Democratic Party to hold dia National convention.
label: pidgin

text: Court say di planned 2025 National Convention of the PDP no go hold until di party comply wit di statutory requirements of di PDP, di Constitution and di Electoral Act.
label: pidgin

text: Na Abraham Ammah, Austine Nwachukwu and George Turner wey carry di mata go court say PDP breach di party constitution for dia plan to hold di convention.
label: pidgin

text: Wia Cameroon opposition leader Issa Tchiroma Bakary dey?
label: pidgin

text: I thank di loyalist army, dem shown patriotism by escorting me to safe location and currently dem dey ensure my protection.
label: pidgin

text: Tchiroma Bakary bin claim say na im win di 12 October, presidential election for Cameroon but di constitutional council declare Paul Biya di winner of di election on Monday 27 October.
label: pidgin

text: Di 76-year-old opposition leader tok say im don move to safe location by im 'loyalists' in di military, afta one big protest break out in di kontri ova di weekend.
label: pidgin

text: Despite dis climate of terror to make us retreat, we no go give in. I diafore call on you, from Monday, November 3 to Wednesday, November 5, to observe ghost town.
label: pidgin

text: Make di entire kontri come to standstill, so di whole world go know say we dey resist and say we no go gree.
label: pidgin

text: Cameroonian pipo. Dis no be di time to dey for fear or dey divided.
label: pidgin

text: I repeat, dem no go steal our victory.
label: pidgin

text: I don make solemn pledge neva to betray una, and I no go fail.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na di reason for di rest of my life. We go win dis togada.
label: pidgin

text: Tchiroma Bakary call for 'ghost town' afta days of post-electoral violence wey don lead to di arrest of plenty pipo, some don die and some wunjure.
label: pidgin

text: Di UN, EU, France, Canada and rights groups such as Human Rights Watch and Amnesty International don condem di killings.
label: pidgin

text: Although normalcy don dey return to some parts of di kontri afta di protest, but di situation on ground remain unpredictable.
label: pidgin

text: Dem don steal our parents, our children prime, and peaceful marches don turn into blind repression, wit facie crimes.
label: pidgin

text: Hundreds don die and wunjure. Entire family dey in grief, recalling di traumatic events of 1984.
label: pidgin

text: While di pipo dey mourn dia misfortune, pipo wey dey responsible for dis tragedy dey celebrate shamelessly, displaying on social media dia cynicism and contempt for di pipo.
label: pidgin

text: Di Judge maintain say no be by force for Inec accept di convention of party wey no follow di Constitution, Electoral Act and di guidelines/regulations of political parties.
label: pidgin

text: For August 2025, di PDP govnors forum bin throw warning give members of di party wey no wan make di convention hold.
label: pidgin

text: On Monday, di party postpone screening if aspirants for di 2025 national convention sake of unforeseen issues. Dem no know wetin court go tok.
label: pidgin

text: Na for di convention of di party dem dey choose di National chairman and all oda national executives of di party.
label: pidgin

text: For April 2025, govnors for PDP bin rule out any option of join bodi wit oda opposition parties in oda to beat di ruling All progressives Congress (APC) by 2027.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na one of di decisions wey di govnors bin reach for dia meeting for Ibadan, Oyo State, at a time wen big members of di party, including former Vice President Atiku Abubakar, dey make moves to join body wit oda political parties.
label: pidgin

text: Defection na one of di big crisis wey don hit PDP dis year and e no be like say e dey stop any moment soon, as several govnors wey dey under di party deygo di ruling APC.
label: pidgin

text: Three out of di six South-South states wey be traditional stronghold of di PDP for more dan 20 year, don witness serious threat sake of defection.
label: pidgin

text: Sake of di latest defections wey dey rock PDP, e don weaken dia power as opposition party wey bin dey control 12 states bifor afta di 2023 general elections.
label: pidgin

text: Wit all di recent trends of defections, di APC now dey control 24 states out of di 36 states for di kontri, while PDP now dey hold eight states.
label: pidgin

text: For one exclusive interview wit BBC News Pidgin, Nyesom Wike say di party no stand any chance for 2027 if dem no put dia house in order.
label: pidgin

text: Wike wey be one of di strong hand for PDP even though e dey di side of di ruling APC as FCT MInister, tok say im no go contest for di 2027 election, sake of say im dey work wit di ruling party and e like am like dat.
label: pidgin

text: Wike howeva come insist say e no go defect from di party.
label: pidgin

text: Since di defeat of di party for di 2023 election, PDP don witness plenti crisis, defections and in-house fighting.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na part of di crisis wey don dey hit di PDP bifor now, and dem go gatz address am for di national convention if e later hold.
label: pidgin

text: Di members of di National Convention Committee na Gov Ahmadu Fintiri as Chairman, Gov. Ademola Adeleke as Vice Chairman and Gov Peter Mbah as Secretary.
label: pidgin

text: Also dem announce members of di zoning committee, according to PDP statement and dem include: Gov Douye Diri as Chairman, Gov Dauda Lawal as Vice Chairman and Gov Caleb Mutfwang as Secretary.
label: pidgin

text: Andrew lose im 'prince' title and go comot from Royal Lodge.
label: pidgin

text: Prince Andrew go loose im 'prince' title and go comot im Windsor mansion wey dem call Royal Lodge.
label: pidgin

text: But e no go dey homeless as e dey go start di royal estate for Sandringham, Norfolk.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na even though Andrew still dey deny di accusations wey dem pile for im head but di Palace say even though 'dis censures dey seen as necessary.'
label: pidgin

text: Na earlier dis month Andrew bin give up im oda royal titles wey include di Duke of York.
label: pidgin

text: Andrew dey face accuse from late Virginia Giuffre say im sleep wit her three separate times wen she be teenager.
label: pidgin

text: Di fact say Andrew dey lose im titles no go affect im pikin dem.
label: pidgin

text: Princess Eugenie and Princess Beatrice go keep dia titles.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na in line wit King George V Letters Patent of 1917.
label: pidgin

text: E tell di BBC say di Palace dey 'finally take some decisive action' but e 'no go reach to fully satisfy di public wahala'.
label: pidgin

text: E dey understood now say not only Andrew go comot di Royal Lodge but im ex-wife Sarah Ferguson go also lose access to di mansion and go need go find wia she go stay.
label: pidgin

text: Di 66 year old former Duchess of York na di mama of im two pikin and even though dem divorce for 1996, dem still be padi wey dey stay di same house.
label: pidgin

text: But she give up her Duchess title dis month wen Andrew drop im own.
label: pidgin

text: Why na now dem wan comot 'Prince' from Andrew?
label: pidgin

text: Na almost six years since Andre interview for BBC Newsnight wey make am step back for im royal duties for 2019 so why na now dem dey comot im prince title.
label: pidgin

text: Well, for dat Newsnight interview, Andrew say e cut any link e get wit paedophile Jeffrey Epstein afta dia picture for New York for December 2010.
label: pidgin

text: But for January 2025, emails comot wey show say dem bin still dey yarn afta dat time.
label: pidgin

text: For October 2025, di Mail on Sunday add say na Andrew send am true-true and even allegedly add say 'e be like we dey dis tin togeda and we go need rise above am'.
label: pidgin

text: Na still dis month, Andrew gree to give up most of im titles like Duke of York although e still stay as Prince.
label: pidgin

text: And den di book afta di death of Virginia Giuffre comot wit more details about her accuse against Prince Andrew., including di one wey she say dem nack three sperate times wen she be teenager. E deny all di accuse.
label: pidgin

text: Who be Timipre Sylva wey deny involvement for alleged Nigeria coup.
label: pidgin

text: Former Minister of State for Petroleum Timipre Sylva don deny im involvement for any alleged coup plot for Nigeria.
label: pidgin

text: Dis dey for statement wey im Special Assistant on Media and Public Affairs, Julius Bokoru sign about reports say authorities raid im house.
label: pidgin

text: During di said operation, considerable damage bin dey inflicted upon di property.
